body_html:
Thanks to everyone for supporting this issue!

The easiest solution is to just use Keras for doing Transfer Learning and Fine-Tuning in TensorFlow.

  • https://keras.io/applications/#usage-examples-for-image-classification-models
  • https://github.com/fchollet/deep-learning-with-python-notebooks/blob/master/5.3-using-a-pretrained-convnet.ipynb
  • https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/TensorFlow-Tutorials/blob/master/10_Fine-Tuning.ipynb

body:
Thanks to everyone for supporting this issue!

The easiest solution is to just use Keras for doing Transfer Learning and Fine-Tuning in TensorFlow.

* https://keras.io/applications/#usage-examples-for-image-classification-models
* https://github.com/fchollet/deep-learning-with-python-notebooks/blob/master/5.3-using-a-pretrained-convnet.ipynb
* https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/TensorFlow-Tutorials/blob/master/10_Fine-Tuning.ipynb
